modules.description: This module implements Gemtext, a plaintext-based format for structured text with support for headings, links, lists, and preformatted blocks. It provides functions to construct and render lines of text, links, headings of varying levels, list items, and quoted text, as well as parsing and pretty-printing utilities. Use cases include generating Gemini protocol responses, formatting terminal output, and parsing or rendering structured text documents.

The module provides abstractions for processing Gemini protocol requests and generating structured responses, focusing on text handling, metadata extraction, and MIME type management. It operates on types like Gemtext documents, strings, sequences, and content streams, with utilities for constructing HTTP-like status codes and response bodies. This enables use cases such as building Gemini servers that handle dynamic content, perform request routing based on URI/path parameters, or serve files with proper MIME type detection.
